doc.name: PublisherTest
doc.description:
This actor publishes input tokens on a named channel and compares the inputs against the value specified by the correctValues parameter.

This actor combines the ptolemy.actor.lib.Publisher actor and the ptolemy.actor.lib.Test actor. Thus, it has quite a bit of duplicated code from the Test actor.
doc.author: Christopher Brooks, based on Test, which has Edward A. Lee and Jim Armstrong as authors
